summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning and the keeping of animals; amending Sections 23.44.048, 9.25.030, 9.25.050, and 9.26.082 of the Seattle Municipal Code and adding new Sections 9.25.052 and 9.26.025 to allow keeping Miniature Potbelly Pigs as pets and fix license fees therefor.
